turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to place an order at the Starbucks at Main and Dallas in Houston, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. sounds good. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking of going with an iced skinny mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk if they have it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they sure do, i'll add that to your order. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you. You don't need to change anything. And yeah, go ahead and order it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to order the drink now or did i need to change anything?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order. the drink will be ready in 15 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else i can do for you?
